products.title: Velvet Royal Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in royal blue, introduces a deep dark blue to your home.

products.title: Trinity Velvet Electric Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Velvet. Its a fabric of unparalleled cosiness and charm, and one that looks magnificent when full of vivid colour. Its a good job this trinity velvet electric blue roman blind has just that. Tonal blues, all the way from the darkest of midnight chased, all the way to a mute velvet.

products.title: Plush Velvet Glacier Blue Roman Blind
products.description: This roman blind is made from hazy, blue-grey fabric with a gorgeous two-tone appearance that ensures your home looks sleek, elegant and ever so inviting.
